name: GRIDIRON 1984
description:
GRIDIRON 1984 is an alternative version of American football, set in vision of the past where nothing makes sense. 

  • WASD to move
  • Space to throw
  • Aim for receivers, avoid tackles, recover fumbles. 
  • Do not go out of bounds.
  • Three quarters per game, 8 downs per quarters, 10 seconds per down.
